rows.label: tlk502102_msg0001
rows.name:
This year's new recruits
aren't up to much.

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0002
rows.name:
They're really going to need
a firmer hand to make decent
soldiers out of them.

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0003
rows.name:
We can train for a hypothetical assault
on Invidia where they have to swim
across the Cloud Sea to get there!

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0004
rows.name: Well, maybe that would be too much...

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0005
rows.name: Hey, excuse me!

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0006
rows.name: How can I help you, young lady?

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0007
rows.name:
Don't you ever think about
the effect such harsh treatment
would have on them?

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0008
rows.name:
They need a little bit of praise now
and again. Doing something for no
reward can be pretty rough, you know!

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0009
rows.name:
You say that... But if we don't put
this lot through hell, they won't
be able to stand up to Invidia...

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0010
rows.name:
Gula is blessed with a lot of lovely
trees. You should take a moment to
contemplate them sometime!

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0011
rows.name:
I bet that'll be just the
kind of pick-me-up you
need to clear your mind.

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0012
rows.name:
Hey, maybe you're right. It's
good to put your thinking cap
on in a new location!

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0013
rows.name:
Haha, you're a sensitive soul, aren't
you, young lady! And very kind to
chat with an old thing like me.

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0014
rows.name:
Well, you just seemed like you
were brooding over something.

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0015
rows.name:
Well, speaking to a girl like
you is like a nice change, and
soothing to the spirit!

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0016
rows.name:
It's only a silly little
thing, but here, have this!

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0017
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Huh? Yeah!

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0018
rows.name: Ah, I don't have time for that.

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0019
rows.name:
I need to come up with a decent
training plan for this lot, sharpish!

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0020
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Huh? That's odd...

rows.label: tlk502102_msg0021
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ] Perhaps my charm failed me this time.
